description: Try our easy to follow Classic BLT - Bacon, Lettuce & Tomato Sandwich recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BLT,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Summer,Father's Day
name: Classic BLT - Bacon, Lettuce & Tomato Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 slice vienna bread (or your own favourite)

recipeInstructions.text: Trim rind from bacon rashers and discard. Cut each rasher in half. Fry in a pan over medium heat until crisp. Remove from pan, drain on paper towel and cover to keep warm.
Toast bread until golden on both sides. Top with shredded lettuce and tomato and season with freshly ground pepper.
Arrange bacon slices over tomato and top with a dollop of mayonnaise. Top with a second slice of toast and serve.
